comment.author: 33087706@N02
comment._content: IHi I have been looking at all the WWW1 pictures as I have been doing Family History for some years now I know my grandfather was in WW1 I know it was tough but when you see these pictures It really brings it home what these men sacrificed for us then no one would think 21years later there would be an other war as the WWW! awas the war to end all wars but then more men & woman lost there lives for there country God Bless them all
